Products & Services Overview: Products & Services Overview: 

Brisk AI provides solutions to automate business growth. Its products include the "Marketing Genie", which offers autonomous content creation and publishing to generate leads, and the "AI Concierge", a real-time customer engagement tool designed to maximize lead conversion. Both products are aimed at plugging time, expertise, and resource gaps for small and medium-sized businesses.

Team Overview: Company Name: Brisk
Industry: Technology, Information and Internet
Location: Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Number of Employees: 7
Business Focus: AI Autopilot for Small Business Marketing
Key Solutions: Marketing Genie (Autonomous content creation and publishing), AI Concierge (Real-time customer engagement)
Website: https://www.getbrisk.ai

Do you have any other affiliate businesses: Yes, we do ...we have a few affiliate business in the technology space that offer AI generated marketing content for small and medium businesses.
